name: Colorful
description:
Choose your character ,design it ,and jump to action.

Test your skills in 8 handcrafted levels of increasing difficulty.

Note:the save system is automatic.

Controls:

Move Left | Left arrow or A |

Move Right | Right arrow or D |

Jump | Up arrow or W |

Change texts | Enter |

Cross portals | Space |

Time travel | Shift |

Change music | F5 |

Pause Games | ESC |

Note:If you haven't noticed you can change your shape by pressing on the "Flare" not by the "+" and "-" these are for size **OK**

Enjoy^^.
